1.title: Franklin and the First Snowfall Festival/Franklin and the Bumpy Fire Buggy
1.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE FIRST SNOWFALL FESTIVAL Franklin has trouble when he plays in the winter games, but things improve when he starts believing in himself! FRANKLIN AND THE BUMPY FIRE BUGGY Franklin and friends create a new invention that helps their fire department on a rescue!

2.title: Franklin and the Adventure of Planet Zorb/Franklin and the Two Unicycles
2.plot: Franklin's friends want to play different games, but they figure out a way to join Spaceship and Pixies! Bear and Franklin figure out a unique way to avoid sharing a bicycle ... although maybe sharing is better!

3.title: Franklin's Firefighter Flapjacks/Franklin and the Missing Mega Machine
3.plot: When Bear and his Dad don't show up to the firefighter flapjack breakfast, it's up to Franklin to find them! Submarine Rescue Guys Franklin and Bear lose their new toy, so they die into their imaginations instead!

4.title: Franklin's School/Franklin Plays Hoppity Bop
4.plot: Franklin's playing school, but Harriet and Bee won't pay attention! How can he make class more exciting? When Franklin and his friends let Bear win a game of Hoppity Bop, are they really making Bear feel better

5.title: Franklin and the Lost Lost Tooth/Franklin and the Karate Klub
5.plot: Franklin helps Fox find his misplaced baby tooth and learn about the ways his friends know they're growing up too. Goose and Franklin want to teach themselves tough karate moves, but they don't want to learn the basics first!

6.title: Franklin and the Woodland Fuzzies/Franklin and Beaver's Show and Sing
6.plot: Franklin wants his friends to play with the toys he invented, but there's a time and place for everything. When Beaver loses her voice, she and Franklin come up with a new plan for their Show-and-Tell project!

7.title: Franklin and the Nature Nuts Hike/Franklin and the Terrible, Terrible Bubble
7.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE NATURE NUTS HIKE Franklin hopes to find a rare meteor on his class nature hike, but what else will he find? FRANKLIN AND THE TERRIBLE, TERRIBLE DRAGON Franklin and his friends are taking turns acting out a story, but he doesn't want anyone else playing his part!

8.title: Franklin and the Drum Circle/Franklin Takes Flight
8.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE DRUM CIRCLE Everyone has a special beat for the Drum Circle, except Franklin - until he finds his beat was with him all along! FRANKLIN TAKES FLIGHT Franklin wants his friends to help him build his plane, but forgets that they may want to fly it too!

9.title: Franklin Gets a Hole-in-One/Franklin and the Radio
9.plot: Franklin learns that having a good time is more important than winning when he plays his first game of mini-golf! Franklin gives his old radio to Fox, but when Fox fixes it up, Franklin suddenly wants it back!

10.title: Franklin's Big Breakfast/Franklin Switches It Up
10.plot: FRANKLIN'S BIG BREAKFAST It's time for the Turtles' Big Family Breakfast, and "Chef" Franklin tries to make it all by himself! FRANKLIN SWITCHES IT UP Franklin and Fox switch roles in the school play and find that trying new things is easier when working together.

11.title: Franklin and the Sculpture Garden/Franklin and the Silly Stakes
11.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE SCULPTURE GARDEN Franklin's giraffe sculpture doesn't turn out just right, but a change of perspective makes a big difference! FRANKLIN AND THE SILLY STAKES Franklin and Bear lose a game and have to stay tied together until dinnertime! Can they become a better team?

12.title: Franklin the Post Turtle/Franklin's Wild Paper Chase
12.plot: FRANKLIN THE POST-TURTLE After going with Mr. Heron to deliver the mail, Franklin sets up his own postal service called Turtle Mail! FRANKLIN'S WILD PAPER CHASE Franklin loses Snail's get-well card and must chase it all over town with his friends! Will it ever reach Snail?

13.title: Super Clueper's Case of the Missing Carrots/Franklin and the Pickle Problem
13.plot: SUPER CLUEPERS CASE OF THE MISSING CARROTS When all of Rabbit's carrots go missing, it's up to Franklin and the Super Cluepers to solve the case! FRANKLIN AND THE PICKLE PROBLEM Franklin finds himself in a pickle when he tells Beaver he likes pickles, even though he really doesn't!

14.title: Who's Who in Woodland, Franklin?/Franklin the Inventor
14.plot: While doing their Who's Who in Woodland project, Franklin and Bear assume they already know all there is to know about Mr. Groundhog. / Franklin and Fox decide they want to be inventors, they find that tinkering and experimenting are just as important to the process as following a plan.

15.title: Franklin and the Acorn Alley Picnic/Super Clueper's Case of the Missing Hat
15.plot: Franklin wants his picnic to be exactly the same as last year's, but sometimes it's better to make new memories. When Franklin loses his lucky baseball cap, the Super Cluepers make it their mission to find it!

16.title: Franklin and the No-Sleep Sleepover/Franklin the Farmer
16.plot: Bear and Franklin stay up late to hear a Submarine Rescue Guys radio show, but can they keep themselves awake? Franklin and Bear work together to come up with a clever plan to keep crows away from Mr. Groundhog's tomatoes!

17.title: Coach Franklin/Franklin's Day with Dad
17.plot: Franklin becomes Bear's personal Stickball coach, but their constant practicing may be a little too intense. When Franklin's dad gets busy helping others, Franklin learns that a day with Dad is special no matter what.

18.title: Franklin and the Heat Wave/Franklin's Rocket Team
18.plot: A heat wave makes it too hot for Franklin's friends to play tag, but a change in plan may be just what they need! /Franklin wants Rabbit to play Rocket Time with him, but Rabbit keeps playing Tea Time with Harriet instead!

19.title: Franklin's Dynaroo Day/Franklin and Harriet in Space
19.plot: Franklin and Beaver pretend to be superheroes, and have a little trouble working together to save the day! When Franklin's friends are too busy to play, Franklin explores space with Harriet instead!

20.title: Franklin's Big Box/Franklin Lends a Hand
20.plot: Franklin and friends need to figure out the purpose of a big, mysterious box they receive from Aunt T. Franklin wants to fly his new plane, but will he have enough time to play after helping his friends?

21.title: Franklin Follows the Leader/Franklin's Wilderness Trip
21.plot: When Goose becomes team leader, Franklin and Beaver learn that listening is just as important as leading. Franklin and Fox go on a camping trip with their dads and learn some great tips from someone unexpected.

22.title: Franklin, Back in the Saddle/Franklin's Backwards Day
22.plot: After falling off his bike, Franklin is scared to get back on. But with some help from friends, he faces his fear! It's Backwards Day, but Goose isn't enjoying! Can Franklin help him appreciate the new holiday?

23.title: Franklin Makes Some Noise/Super Cluepers' Case of the Missing School Bell
23.plot: After spraining his ankle, Franklin needs help from his friends to adjust to the situation. When the Super Cluepers have trouble finding objects that have mysteriously vanished, the gang gets creative!

24.title: Super Clueper's Case of the New Friend/Franklin's Woodland Night
24.plot: The Super Cluepers are off to find the new Woodland family of skunks and make a new friend! Franklin and friends are spending the night under the stars! And Skunk, the nighttime expert, is coming along!

25.title: The Super Cluepers and the Mysterious Mark/Franklin vs the Ninjaroos
25.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

26.title: Franklin and the Four Seasons
26.plot: Franklin and his friends have an exciting school project to write the songs about the four seasons. But when every idea Franklin and Snail get for their spring song seems to be already taken by one of the other groups, they struggle with the assignment. It is only through true perseverance do they finally hit upon their very own unique idea, a spring song that celebrates all the seasons!

1.title: Franklin's All Ears/Franklin and the Gecko Games
1.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE GECKO GAMES Franklin and Beaver compete to be Gordon the Gecko's sitter, putting their friendship to the test! FRANKLIN'S ALL EARS Franklin and Snail do some snooping into their friends' suspicious behavior.

2.title: Franklin and the Snow Princess/Franklin and the Firefly Festival
2.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE SNOW PRINCESSWhen Beaver suffers an accident, Franklin leads his friends in creating a skating throne that allows Beaver to go on.FRANKLIN AND THE FIREFLY FESTIVALBear doesn't think he has a dance for the Firefly Festival.

3.title: Franklin's Special Job/Franklin Needs a Reminder
3.plot: FRANKLIN'S SPECIAL JOB Franklin looks for a job but discovers that making Harriet feel important is the most special job of all. FRANKLIN NEEDS A REMINDER Franklin learns not to take advantage of his friendship with Bear to get out of trouble!

4.title: Franklin's Partner/Franklin Helps Out
4.plot: FRANKLIN HELPS OUTKeeping promises is important.Franklin fulfils a promise to help Aunt T with her chores & has unexpected fun.FRANKLIN'S PARTNERGood partners make decisions together.Franklin & Bear combine their ideas to make a bumpy buggy.

5.title: Franklin and the Pinecone Pass/Franklin and the Creepy Clock
5.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE PINECONE PASS When Bear enjoys playing Rabbit's new game, Franklin fears that Bear has found a new best friend! FRANKLIN AND THE CREEPY CLOCK After Harriet hears a scary story, Franklin must help her get over her fear.

6.title: Franklin and the Mystery of the Berry Bogie/Franklin Sees a Storm
6.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE BERRY BOGIELeaders bring people together. Franklin must get the Super Cluepers to work together.FRANKLIN SEES A STORMChange can be difficult, but exciting. A storm hits Woodland destroying the tree fort.

7.title: Franklin and the Mystery of the Blue Begonia/Franklin, the Planner
7.plot: Mr. Groundhog's Blue Begonia gets mysteriously picked and the Super Cluepers assemble to solve the enigma. / Franklin gets everyone to merge their plans for the new Tree Fort into one grand structure.

8.title: Franklin's Ups and Downs/Franklin's New Teacher
8.plot: FRANKLIN'S UPS AND DOWNSWhen Franklin can't master his new Pogo Paws and Bear can't remember the new clubFRANKLIN'S NEW TEACHERFranklin is upset when Mr. Owl is to be temporarily replaced

9.title: Franklin and Snail Mail/Franklin the Moose-eratops
9.plot: FRANKLIN AND SNAIL MAILWith the help of Mr. Mole's train set, Franklin helps Snail see the World.FRANKLIN AND THE MOOSERATOPSFranklin and Bear take things too far when decide to be Mooseratops.

10.title: Franklin Finds the Treasure/Franklin and the Tunnel Team-Up
10.plot: FRANKLIN FINDS THE TREASUREFranklin urges Bear and their Dads forward in a search for buried treasure.FRANKLIN AND THE TUNNEL TEAM-UPBear and Mr. Owl take on Franklin and Mr. Groundhog in a Bumpy Buggy race.

11.title: Franklin and the Snow Dragon/Franklin Gets Bugged
11.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE SNOW DRAGONFranklin is excited to be spending three days at Bear's house, but soon misses his own home.FRANKLIN GETS BUGGEDFranklin brings Fox and Beaver together to make a great bug habitat.

12.title: Franklin in the Stars/Franklin and Sam
12.plot: FRANKLIN IN THE STARSFranklin's plan of star gazing with Aunt T's telescope is ruined by clouds.FRANKLIN AND SAMFranklin has to think of a substitute when Harriet takes a liking to Sam and refuses to give him up.

13.title: Franklin and the Bumpy Buggy/It's Father's Day, Franklin!
13.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE BUMPY BUGGYFranklin and Bear create the first Bumpy Buggy.IT'S FATHER'S DAY FRANKLINFranklin is excited at making the perfect Father's Day gift for Mr. Turtle that he spends the day creating one and paying no attention to Dad.

14.title: Franklin and the Wonder/Franklin, the Little Bubble
14.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE WONDERYou can help others overcome fears with a little creative thinking. Franklin & Aunt T help Rabbit overcome his fear.FRANKLIN THE LITTLE BUBBLEIt is important to fix your mistakes.Franklin sabotages Aunt T's party.

15.title: Franklin, Take Harriet with You/Franklin's New Hat
15.plot: TAKE HARRIET WITH YOUFranklin and Bear are asked to watch their little sisters, throwing a wrench into their plans.FRANKLIN'S NEW HATHarriet makes Franklin an enormous and awkward Spring Festival hat and Franklin must confess that he wrecked it.

16.title: Franklin and the Shadow Show/Franklin's Fishing Trip
16.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE SHADOW SHOWMrs. Turtle arrives in Franklin's class to help, but must divide her time with everyone & has little left to help Franklin.FRANKLIN'S FISHING TRIPFranklin decides to share his fort with Harriet on a family camping trip.

17.title: Franklin Flies His Kite/Franklin's Flying Lessons
17.plot: FRANKLIN FLIES HIS KITEFranklin is disappointed when his kite doesn't compare to his Dad's and decides to try to fly his Dad's kite.FRANKLIN'S FLYING LESSONFranklin thinks that Goose should fly and pushes his hesitant friend into trying.

18.title: Franklin Changes the Rules/Franklin and Harriet's Buggy
18.plot: FRANKLIN AND HARRIET'S BUGGYFranklin builds Harriet a Bumpy Buggy, but forgets to listen to what she wants.FRANKLIN CHANGES THE RULESWhen Beaver's game of pirate treasure finders has too many rules, Franklin proposes a new game - no rules.

19.title: The Super Cluepers Big Small Case/Franklin and the Mystery Muddle
19.plot: THE SUPER CLUEPERS BIG SMALL CASEThe Super Cluepers set out to solve a REALLY big and exciting case.FRANKLIN AND THE MYSTERY MUDDLEFranklin sends the Super Cluepers on a practice mission to hone their skills.

20.title: It's Halloween Franklin!/Franklin the Adventurer
20.plot: Franklin and Beaver help each other conquer their fears to navigate Aunt T's spooktacularHalloween Maze./Bear and Franklin elect to camp out like real adventurers - doing everything by themselves.

21.title: Frankln and the Super Sleepover/Frankln and the Snoring Situation
21.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE SUPER SLEEPOVERThe Beaver family arrives for a stay with the Turtles. Franklin feels put out that his routine is being disturbed.FRANKLIN AND THE SNORING SITUATIONThe Submarine Squad game grinds to a halt due to Bear dozing off.

22.title: Engineer Franklin/Franklin Needs to Notice
22.plot: FRANKLIN THE ENGINEERFranklin has to admit he's in over his head and ask Mr. Mole for help when fixing the model train set.FRANKLIN NEEDS TO NOTICEGoose's ballet jump saves the magic show that Franklin and Bear stage for Mother's Day.

23.title: Franklin's Spaceship/Franklin and the Missing Monarch Mystery
23.plot: FRANKLIN'S SPACESHIPFranklin is so excited about playing Space Ship, he doesn't listen to the Snail.FRANKLIN AND THE MISSING MONARCH MYSTERYFranklin & the Super Cluepers find that sitting quietly is a better way to solve themystery.

24.title: Franklin the Dinosaur Hunter/Franklin Paints a Picture
24.plot: FRANKLIN THE DINOSAUR HUNTERFranklin, Bear and Rabbit find a time capsule full of strange artefacts.FRANKLIN PAINTS A PICTUREIn his exuberance, Franklin ruins Beaver's painting.

25.title: Franklin's Earth Day/Franklin and the Amazing Stupendous Circus Trick
25.plot: FRANKLIN AND THE AMAZING STUPENDOUS CIRCUS TRICKFranklin learns to spin plates from Aunt T and is surprised to learn that the class thinks he can do more.FRANKLIN'S EARTH DAYFranklin's over-zealousness nearly ruins the classes' Earth Day project.

26.title: Franklin's Campout/Franklin's Christmas Spirit
26.plot: When everyone drops out of carolling, Franklin decides to sing anyway./Mr. Turtle substitutes for Bear on Franklin's Campout, and Franklin has to learn to be flexible in his expectations.

imdb.title: Franklin and Friends

production companies.name: Bell Broadcast and New Media Fund

plot: Franklin is back - he's older, wiser and coming out of his shell. Franklin joins his familiar friends, Bear, Fox, Rabbit and the rest of the bunch, with new adventures in Woodland.
